title: Harry Potter à l'École des Sorciers
description: On his eleventh birthday, Harry Potter, an orphan raised by an uncle and aunt who despise him, sees his life turned upside down. A giant comes to take him to Hogwarts, a school of witchcraft! Flying on a broomstick, casting spells, fighting trolls: Harry proves to be a gifted wizard. But a mystery surrounds his birth and the terrible V..., the dark wizard whose name no one dares to speak.
